title: Imperial County MEHKO
description: Imperial County allows Microenterprise Home Kitchen Operations with a county permit. Contact Environmental Health, submit the application with menu and SOP, pay fees, and hold a Food Protection Manager Certification.

steps.title: Verify Eligibility
steps.content:
- Operate from your private home kitchen.
- Follow county MEHKO rules.
- Permit required.
- Food Protection Manager Certification required.

steps.title: Application Requirements
steps.content:
- Contact Imperial County Environmental Health.
- Submit Health Permit Application + menu + SOP.
- Pay fees.
- Maintain valid Food Protection Manager Certification.

steps.title: Prepare SOP
steps.content: Complete the SOP template to describe your operations and food safety controls.

steps.title: Official MEHKO Application
steps.content: Fill out and submit the official MEHKO application with supporting documents.
